description: MainActivity.kt is the entry point for an Android application built using Jetpack Compose. It sets up theming, navigation, and a TV-friendly top navigation bar component, including focus management for TV interfaces.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: The main Android activity which sets up the compose UI, theme, navigation controller, and top navigation bar.

classes.name: TopNavBar
classes.description: A composable function creating a row of navigation chips with focus management for TV navigation.

classes.name: NavChip
classes.description: A composable representing a focusable, clickable TV navigation chip with focus styling.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up the compose content, theme, and navigation.

methods.name: TopNavBar
methods.description: Creates a horizontal row of navigation chips (Home, Search, Settings) with focus management.

methods.name: NavChip
methods.description: Creates a focusable, clickable navigation element with styling for TV interface.
